entry.title: IN EFFECT, Fort Liard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM MDT Wednesday 01 December 0

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with periods of wet snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016
